summary: This appears to be an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated November 30, 2018, transmitting legal materials related to a case involving Epstein. The attachments include a plaintiff's motion, a memorandum, a government reply, and an NPA (Non-Prosecution Agreement).

locations.context: Office of the Assistant United States Attorney, Southern District of New York

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York sent an email on November 30, 2018, regarding Epstein-related legal materials.
The email attachments include a plaintiff's motion, a memorandum dated November 29, 2018, a government reply, and an NPA (Non-Prosecution Agreement).
The correspondence originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office at One Saint Andrew's Plaza in New York, NY.
The document reference '08 Civ 80736' suggests it pertains to a civil case filed in 2008.
The transmission of an NPA (Non-Prosecution Agreement) indicates discussion of prosecutorial agreements related to the Epstein case.
